name: The Heretic of Hollow Street
storyline: A taciturn barber in Veilgarden offers to cut more than just his patrons' hair. Where did he get his comb and scissors from? Are you brave enough to sit in the Barber of Hollow Street's chair?
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story from September, 2019. The first entry in the Season of Propinquity.
